ygData.subject: RE: Question...
ygData.msgSnippet: Ack, one more post!  That would make me quit the game no question.  I am often joked about because I have been known to go from Halas to Kaladim and back again
ygData.messageBody:
Ack, one more post! That would make me quit the game no question. I am
often joked about because I have been known to go from Halas to Kaladim and
back again in one nites play and that's in about 3 hours. I can never stand
to stay in the same zone for more than a couple of days tops, i want more
variety than that. Maybe that's why I want more binding somewhere,
anywhere.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 30, 1999 6:12 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Question...


From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>

That would be me. I can personally attest that it is often very difficult
for me to get a bind because of the time zone I live in. When I do get to
play, its usually after 9PM Hawaii time. Thats midnight on the west coast
and 3AM on the east coast. What I usually end up doing is picking a zone I
want to adventure in and staying there for a couple of weeks. I don't go to
a new zone unless its a weekend and I can spend more hours playing.

Galtin of E'ci

> If I lived in Hawaii like some on this list
> I would despair of ever getting bound in my what would be my prime playing
> hours. You better know someone real well who can bind and you would
> probably be restricted to playing with those people where those people
> wanted to play.
>
>
